decks.notes: The deck focuses on controlling the game by using a combination of creatures that provide card advantage like Glint-Nest Crane and Champion of Wits, along with disruption elements like Hostage Taker and Thrashing Brontodon. The key strategy involves using Gate to the Afterlife to fill the graveyard and eventually bring back powerful threats like Verdurous Gearhulk and Walking Ballista with God-Pharaoh's Gift. Llanowar Elves and Merfolk Branchwalker help accelerate mana production and provide early board presence. The deck aims to outvalue the opponent through efficient creature recursion and card advantage.

The focus of this Orzhov Control deck is on utilizing removal spells and planeswalkers to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck includes a variety of removal spells like Vraska's Contempt and Fatal Push, as well as planeswalkers like Vraska, Relic Seeker and Karn, Scion of Urza to generate card advantage and threats. Additionally, cards like Treasure Map and The Eldest Reborn provide additional value and card advantage. The mana base is structured to support the deck's control elements while also ensuring consistency in casting spells.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and powerful creatures while maintaining pressure on the board. By using efficient mana accelerators like Llanowar Elves and Greenbelt Rampager, the deck aims to quickly deploy threats like Steel Leaf Champion and Rhonas the Indomitable. Other key cards like Ghalta, Primal Hunger and Scrapheap Scrounger provide additional threats and recursion options. The inclusion of vehicles like Heart of Kiran and Skysovereign, Consul Flagship adds versatility and evasion to the deck. Overall, the strategy revolves around aggressive play and high creature density to pressure the opponent.

The main focus of this Red Deck Wins deck is to have a fast and aggressive playstyle by utilizing low-cost creatures and burn spells to deal damage quickly to the opponent. The deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent while utilizing cards like Ahn-Crop Crasher, Goblin Chainwhirler, and Hazoret the Fervent to control the board and finish off the opponent. With a high number of burn spells like Shock and Lightning Strike, the deck can also bypass blockers and deal direct damage to the opponent, making it difficult for them to stabilize.

The main focus of this Golgari Aggro deck is to quickly build a strong board presence by utilizing aggressive creatures like Jadelight Ranger, Thorn Lieutenant, and Verdurous Gearhulk. The deck aims to ramp up mana with Llanowar Elves and Rishkar, Peema Renegade to be able to play multiple threats each turn. Additional value is gained from cards like Winding Constrictor and Walking Ballista, while removal spells like Ravenous Chupacabra and Cast Down help to control the board. The deck also includes some card draw and land fixing to ensure consistency in its aggressive strategy.

The main concept of this Jeskai Control deck is to use counterspells, removal, and card draw to control the game until Teferi, Hero of Dominaria can be played to take over the game. The deck utilizes a mix of instant speed removal and counterspells to deal with threats while cycling through the deck with cards like Glimmer of Genius and Search for Azcanta. Once Teferi hits the board, the deck can generate card advantage and control the game with his powerful abilities. Ultimately, the goal of the deck is to outlast the opponent and win through attrition.

The deck focuses on utilizing powerful creatures with abilities to pressure the opponent early in the game. By including a mix of aggressive creatures like Knight of Malice and Scrapheap Scrounger, along with removal spells like Fatal Push and Cast Out, the deck aims to maintain board presence and control while also disrupting the opponent's strategy. The inclusion of planeswalkers like Gideon of the Trials and Ajani, Adversary of Tyrants adds additional value and versatility to the deck, providing multiple ways to close out the game quickly.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by using Improvise mechanics to cast spells more efficiently. By utilizing cards like Inspiring Statuary and Mox Amber, the deck aims to generate mana and draw cards through artifacts such as Renegade Map and Prophetic Prism. This allows the player to set up powerful plays with cards like Aetherflux Reservoir and Paradoxical Outcome, while also disrupting the opponent's strategies with counter spells like Metallic Rebuke. The deck also includes key creatures like Sai, Master Thopterist and Karn, Scion of Urza to generate additional value and threats on the battlefield.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively control the board with powerful creatures like Glint-Sleeve Siphoner, Knight of Grace, and Knight of Malice, while also utilizing removal spells like Fatal Push and Vraska's Contempt to eliminate threats. The deck also includes strong finishers like Angel of Sanctions and Lyra Dawnbringer to close out the game. Ajani, Adversary of Tyrants can provide additional support by buffing your creatures. Additionally, cards like History of Benalia and Ixalan's Binding help to maintain board control and disrupt your opponent's strategy.

The primary strategy of this deck is to control the game through countering, removing, and delaying opponent's threats while setting up card advantage and board control. By utilizing a combination of counterspells like Essence Scatter and Disallow, removal spells like Seal Away and Settle the Wreckage, card draw spells like Glimmer of Genius and Hieroglyphic Illumination, and powerful planeswalker Teferi, Hero of Dominaria, this deck aims to outlast opponents and win through incremental advantage. The inclusion of Search for Azcanta and additional win conditions like Torrential Gearhulk also provide additional flexibility and late-game power.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through cards like Fatal Push and Supreme Will, while generating value through cards like Tezzeret the Schemer and Marionette Master. The deck also includes a strong removal suite with Vraska's Contempt and Walking Ballista. The win conditions include using Marionette Master to drain the opponent's life total and creating an army of tokens with Karn, Scion of Urza. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan and outvalue them through card advantage and powerful threats.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and powerful tribal synergy. By utilizing cards like Binding Mummy, Death Baron, and Lord of the Accursed to boost the strength of your zombie creatures, this deck aims to hit hard and fast while controlling the board with removal spells like Fatal Push. Liliana, Untouched by Death provides additional value by buffing zombies and generating card advantage. With a strong mana base to support the aggressive strategy, this Orzhov Aggro deck aims to close out games swiftly.

This deck focuses on aggressively playing low-cost, high-impact creatures to quickly deal damage to the opponent. By applying pressure early in the game with cards like Ahn-Crop Crasher and Goblin Chainwhirler, it aims to reduce the opponent's life total as fast as possible. Hazoret the Fervent and Rekindling Phoenix provide strong late-game threats that can help close out the game. The deck also includes removal spells like Abrade and Lightning Strike to deal with opposing threats and clear the way for its own creatures to attack.

The deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with efficient and powerful creatures like Resilient Khenra, Longtusk Cub, Llanowar Elves, and Steel Leaf Champion. It aims to overwhelm opponents with early aggression and use cards like Ghalta, Primal Hunger and Rhonas the Indomitable to deliver big hits. The deck also includes cards like Heart of Kiran and Rishkar, Peema Renegade to provide additional support and ways to push damage through. Blossoming Defense offers protection for key creatures, while Commit / Memory provides versatility in disrupting opponents' plans.
